AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shaolin
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was accepted for training at an ancient Shaolin monastery after HIS family died to various tragedies. HECAP was raised by the blind master Po, who became HIS beloved mentor.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wandering monk
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: One day, NAME's beloved mentor and elder, Master Po, is murdered by the Emperor's nephew; outraged, NAME retaliates by killing the nephew. With a price on HIS head, NAME is forced to flee...

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young astrophysicist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: A young NAME was inspired by a visit to the World's Fair. Seeing all the amazing applications and explorations of science left a deep sense of awe and wonder at the mechanics of the universe. This started HIS path to astronomy and astrophysics.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Astrophysics professor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Over time, NAME's passion for scientific discovery pushed HIM to write a multitude of books and other media devoted to astronomy and astrophysics.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Space kid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME had an average childhood, earning a freighter pilot's license and a position as a Duty Warrant Officer aboard a commercial towing vessel, the Nostromo.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Survivor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After being diverted to a strange mysterious planet, one of NAME's crewmates was implanted with an alien embryo, which incubated within his body before bursting forth and terrorizing the crew. Over a short period of time, the creature killed NAME's crewmates. After a harrowing series of events, HE managed to eject the stowaway from an airlock and escape.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Space trucker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After an average adolescence, NAME spent many years roaming the galaxy as a long-haul driver. HIS off-beat bravado and open nature helped HIM make friends in many strange places.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: True hero
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: While visiting HIS old friend Wang on the planet Ching-Dai, bandits kidnap Wang's fiancee, setting off an incredible chain of events. They cross paths with an ancient cursed sorceror, Lo-Pan, who seeks to sacrifice the young girl to break his curse. After a series of chases, battles, and thoroughly shaking the pillars of heaven, NAME and Wang save the day - and NAME heads back off to his unending journey...

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young barky
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME grew up in a hot southern region, dreaming of becoming a holonet star, or sometimes just Nachos. (Eating them, not becoming them)

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Displaced streamer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME got established as a holonet personality, producing holovids and live holostreams. Somehow, NAME ended up here... Don't ask me how!
